body:
We are in need of more members for the Avicus contest committee, and decided to open up an applications post. In this team you will help to judge maps submitted to Avicus for various contests that we set up, as well as participate in discussions about what upcoming contests should be like.

We will be accepting applications into the team, until we have around 15-18 players in the team.
Current Members:
Dawning_
Sethskye
Blazikenite
PokerFace
Fouled
Tynvale
Eako
RileGuy
Jahaj
resepignev
Myv

If you are interested, please apply in the format below.

IGN -
Skype -
Timezone -
How have you contributed to the mapping community on Avicus? -
How could you benefit the Team? -
What are you're motives for joining this team? -

You will be put in a Skype chat once you are accepted, and you may apply up to two times. 
Current members of this team will be judging your applications.

Good luck!

title: CONTEST COMMITTE APPLICATION 2 (Open)

replies.body: Do I have to be able to go on Avicus?
replies.body_tagged: Do I have to be able to go on Avicus?

replies.body: It is preferred that you are able to, but not necessary
replies.body_tagged: It is preferred that you are able to, but not necessary

reply_to.body: Do I have to be able to go on Avicus?
reply_to.body_tagged: Do I have to be able to go on Avicus?

replies.body:
IGN jracer15
Skype jracer15
Timezone EST
How have you contributed to the mapping community on Avicus? I have had 3 accepted maps, including one made for testing a reviving gamemode.  I have presented series of ideas for the map devs before.
How could you benefit the Team? I am big on organization and improving.  I am some of the few to fully understand the walls gamemode on the Avicus community but also understand how a map for other gamemodes can stand out.
What are your motives for joining this team? I've played and been in the Avicus community for over a year but I'm sure most of you don't really know me as a person too well.  I would like to truly feel I have made a contribution to the community in some sort of way.

IGN - RiloYT

Skype -  rilomilothe9123

Timezone -AEST (Sorry)

How have you contributed to the mapping community on Avicus? -I have made several maps; Eerie Mausoleum (Accepted), Windmill Cove (Got to testing then denied), Currently making tourney map (No state at all), Wonderful World (Accepted),

How could you benefit the Team? -I love mapping on avicus! I have always wanted to help the community in some way. I will help/benefit the team in anyway, I can judge and build maps. I am pretty blank at this point of time, but that's my shot :P

What are you're motives for joining this team? -Helping the community, Judging maps and basically what ever

Timezone - BST/GMT
How have you contributed to the mapping community on Avicus?- I have build quite a few maps but have never really submitted them. I have also helped various map developers test out maps on scrim servers etc.
How could you benefit the Team? - I am very good at organisation, know good maps and how to judge them and have a positive aftitude.
What are you're motives for joining this team? - I would really love to help out more on Avicus in the maps area and think this would be a great opportunity for it!

What are your motives for joining the team: I love being apart of a team. Love building and making maps and I want to give back to Avicus because I was banned and all.

replies.body:
IGN - nintendoboy11
Skype - nintendoboy11
Timezone - EST
How have you contributed to the mapping community on Avicus? - No, I have not made a map or contributed to the mapping community. If I am accepted thought I will contribute by probably helping make a map and giving some feedback on maps. 
How could you benefit the Team? -  I would benefit this team by giving my best feedback, always showing up for things, and being a good guy. I will do my best when it comes to giving feedback or to judge maps because we want good maps in the rots. I will also give my full opinion on a map. I won't really sugar-coat anything or lie when I am giving feedback, I will tell you that your map sucks and why because I don't want a bad map to go into the rots and I will tell you that your map is good and why it should be in the rots. 
What are you're motives for joining this team? - If I join this team I plan on being active if we are needed to give feedback or vote on something, meet some new people because I am a loner xD, and to just have fun because this is all about having fun. I will also be very serious when it's time to be serious about things and fun when it's time to be fun and to just joke around and stuff.
